ESP8266_IoT.initWIFI|block: 設置 ESP8266 模組|RX %tx|TX %rx|波特率 %baudrate
ESP8266_IoT.connectWifi|block: 連接WIFI無線網絡 WIFI名稱 = %ssid|WIFI密碼 = %pw
ESP8266_IoT.breakMQTT|block: 斷開與 broker 的連接
ESP8266_IoT.connectMQTT|block: 連接 MQTT broker host(域名): %host port(端口): %port reconnect(重連): $reconnect
ESP8266_IoT.setMQTT|block: 設置 MQTT 客戶端配置|scheme(協議): %scheme clientID(客戶端 ID): %clientID username(用戶名): %username password(密碼): %password path(路徑): %path
ESP8266_IoT.setData|block: 設置發送到ThingSpeak平臺的數據 | API key = %write_api_key|Field 1 = %n1||Field 2 = %n2|Field 3 = %n3|Field 4 = %n4|Field 5 = %n5|Field 6 = %n6|Field 7 = %n7|Field 8 = %n8
ESP8266_IoT.uploadData|block: 上傳數據到 ThingSpeak 平臺
ESP8266_IoT.connectSmartiot|block: 連接 SmartIoT 平臺使用 userToken: %userToken Topic: %topic
ESP8266_IoT.disconnectSmartiot|block: 斷開與 SmartIoT 平臺的連接
ESP8266_IoT.setSmartIotUploadData|block: 設置發送到 SmartIoT 平臺的數據 |數據 1 = %n1||數據 2 = %n2|數據 3 = %n3|數據 4 = %n4|數據 5 = %n5|數據 6 = %n6|數據 7 = %n7|數據 8 = %n8
ESP8266_IoT.uploadSmartIotData|block: 上傳數據到 SmartIoT 平臺
ESP8266_IoT.iotSwitchEvent|block: 當 SmartIoT 平臺開關 %vocabulary 時
ESP8266_IoT.postIFTTT|block: 發送 IFTTT 數據|value1:%value value2:%value2 value3:%value3
